tracks.title: Church Outfit
lyrics: [Chorus]
This is the dress I want to be buried in
Leave the rings, I might need them
Unholy water, take a sip
This is my church outfit
[Verse]
Life is a commercial for death
Anger is something I work to manifest
Life is a commercial for death
And you're hypnotized by the advertisement
I'll dress to the nines, show up on time
You can wear whatever you like
Dress to the nines, show up on time
You can wear whatever you like
[Chorus]
This is the dress I want to be buried in
Leave the rings, I might need them
Unholy water, take a sip
This is my church outfit
[Outro]
It's my confession and my testament
Don't need your weapons, I got my own
And you said I couldn't commit
This is my church outfit
It's my confession and my testament
Don't need your weapons, I got my own
And you said I couldn't commit
This is my church outfit

tracks.title: Knockoff
lyrics: [Verse]
I don't want no
Want no knockoff
Want that real shit
Real authentic
I don't want no
Want no fake love
Want that real shit
Real authentic (Authentic)
[Pre-Chorus]
What is it, boy? Qu'est-ce que c'est?
Trailer park or real estate?
I can't take no more mistakes
Polyester hurts my skin
Tell me what you'd wrap me in
Synthetic or genuine?
[Chorus]
I want the real thing
Baby, you look to me like you're the real thing
I wanna know
Am I dreamin'?
How you gonna prove to me that you're the real thing?
I wanna know
[Verse]
I don't want no (Don't want no)
Want no knockoff (No knockoff)
Want that real shit (That real shit)
Real authentic
I don't want no (Don't want no)

Trailer park or real estate?
I can't take no more mistakes
Polyester hurts my skin
Tell me what you'd wrap me in
Synthetic or genuine?
[Chorus]
I want the real thing
Baby, you look to me like you're the real thing
I wanna know
Am I dreamin'?
How you gonna prove to me that you're the real thing?
I wanna know
[Verse]
I don't want no (Don't want no)
Want no knockoff (No knockoff)
Want that real shit (That real shit)
Real authentic (Authentic)
I don't want no (Don't want no)
Want no fake love (No fake love)
Want that real shit (That real shit)
Real authentic (Authentic)
[Bridge]
Used to be scared of somethin' real
I'm ready now, I'm ready
I lay it bare for you to steal
I'm ready now, I'm ready
[Chorus]
I want the real thing
Baby, you look to me like you're the real thing
I wanna know
Am I dreamin'?
How you gonna prove to me that you're the real thing?
I wanna know

I don't (Don't want no)
Want no kn— (No knockoff)
Want that r— (That real shit)
Real auth— (Authentic)

Want no f— (No fake love)
Want that r— (That real shit)

tracks.title: Hard
lyrics: [Verse 1]
Hard
My body's so hard
Only shoot to hit the mark
I’m only breathing to keep my intellect sharp
Dark
My sense of humor, so dark
Terrifying for a spark
I see you reaching, can't catch me off guard
[Chorus]
Hard, my body's so hard
Only shoot to hit the mark, shoot to hit the mark
Keep my nails so sharp, tear you apart
Whatever you are
I’m so hard
I'm so hard
I'm so hard
I'm so hard
[Verse 2]
Can't trust
What I can't throw very far
Take a walk in the park
And on the weekend, you'll catch me working on my car
Woke up
And saw it as it was
You thought that it was tough
But it crumbled with a touch
[Chorus]
Hard, my body's so hard
Only shoot to hit the mark, shoot to hit the mark
Keep my nails so sharp, tear you apart
Whatever you are
I’m so hard
I’m so hard
I'm so hard
I’m so hard
[Bridge]
No spine, no right, no love, no dice
I always pay the price
No spine, no right, no love, no dice
I always finish your fights
No spine, no right, no love, no dice
I always pay the price
No spinе, no right, no love, no dice
I always finish your fights
[Chorus]
Hard, my body's so hard
Only shoot to hit the mark, shoot to hit thе mark
Keep my nails so sharp, tear you apart
Whatever you are
I'm so hard
I'm so hard
I’m so hard
I'm so hard

tracks.title: What It Becomes
lyrics: [Verse 1]
Take all my rage and stuff it down
Call it by its name or something else
It'll change what it becomes
Hype myself up to leave the house
'Cause I don't like to see what's out there
[Pre-Chorus]
Screamin' in an empty room
So you can't see what I do
So you can't see what I do
Screamin' in an empty room
[Chorus]
Whoever you tie yourself to
Whoever you're gonna be kind to
Whoever thinks that you're deep
Whoever you're gonna complain to
Whoever takes time to train you
Whoevеr keeps you company
Whatever advice you'rе takin'
Now who's in the picture? Frame it
Whoever you think you're savin'
One day, you'll see
It won't be me
[Chorus]
Whoever you tie yourself to
Whoever you're gonna be kind to
Whoever thinks that you're deep
Whoever you're gonna complain to
Whoever takes time to train you
Whoever keeps you company
Whatever advice you're takin'
Now who's in the picture? Frame it
Whoever you think you're savin'
One day, you'll see
[Verse 2]
Find a place to be alone
Call it by its name or something else
It'll change what it becomes
Pace around and sit back down
'Cause I already know what's out there
[Chorus]
Whoever you tie yourself to
Whoever you're gonna be kind to
Whoever thinks that you're deep
Whoever you're gonna complain to
Whoever takes the time to train you
Whoever keeps you company
Whatever advice you're takin'
Now who's in the picture? Frame it
Whoever you think you're savin'
One day, you'll see
It won't be me
[Outro]
Whoever you tie yourself to
Whoever you're gonna be kind to
Whoever thinks that you're deep
Whoever you're gonna complain to
Whoever takes time to train you
Whoever keeps you company
Whatever advice you're takin'
Now who's in the picture? Frame it
Whoever you think you're savin'
One day, you'll see
It won't be me

tracks.title: Flicker
lyrics: [Verse 1]
Never put your grimy hands on my steering wheel
Tryna jerk me off the road
I'll be the drive in my own life
Vigilant, self-assured, I know that makes you hard
But you can't run me off the road
Won't be fooled by my own heart
[Pre-Chorus]
Color me virginal
Color me all the perversions of
Someone who could cut you off, surgical
God, please be merciful
[Chorus]
'Cause I flicker between fear and a vision of forever
I flicker between fear and a vision of forever
That's too much time for you to change your mind
I flicker between fear and a vision of, vision of forever
[Verse 2]
I am mine and you are mine and I am not yours
I can drive a manual, flip it in reverse
Stutter, shudder, shift and mutter, watch you contort
But I'm the one and you're the other
Get the fuck out of my car
[Pre-Chorus]
Color me virginal
Color me all the perversions of
Someone who could cut you off, surgical
God, please be merciful
[Chorus]
'Cause I flicker between fear and a vision of forever
I flicker between fear and a vision of forever
That's too much time for you to change your mind
I flicker between fear and a vision of, vision of forever

tracks.title: 1s + 0s
lyrics: [Verse 1]
Can't identify surplus or deficits
'Til we've crawled through mud and rolled down through the trenches
And we've met at the highest of the summits
'Til you've held my hand too tight as we plummet
[Chorus]
So many ones and zeroes, so many ones and zeroes
Is my name safe in your mouth?
So many ones and zeroes, so many ones and zeroes
Is my name safe in your mouth?
[Post-Chorus]
So many one, one, one, one, ones
So many ones, one, onе, one, ones
Don't call me thе one, one, one, one, one
'Less I'm the only one, one, one, one, one
[Verse 2]
Meet me in the only tense that is present
Hold my line of defense 'til I cement it
Will you follow me, intrinsic in motive
If it don't go the way that you suppose it?
[Chorus]
So many ones and zeroes, so many ones and zeroes
Is my name safe in your mouth?
So many ones and zeroes, so many ones and zeroes
Is my name safe in your mouth?
[Post-Chorus]
So many one, one, one, one, ones
So many ones, one, one, one, ones
Don't call me the one, one, one, one, one
'Less I'm the only one, one, one, one, one

tracks.title: Zig
lyrics: [Verse 1]
When you zig, I zag
When you take, I grab
When you nod, I shake
While you're sleepin', I'm awake, I'm awake
When you cry, I laugh
You subtract, I add
When you drop, I catch
When you bend, I snap
When you zig, I zag
[Chorus]
When you zig, I zag, when you zig, I zag
I zigzag
When you zig, I zag, when you zig, I zag
I zigzag
When you zig, I zag, when you zig, I zag
I zigzag
When you zig, I zag, when you zig, I zag
I zigzag
[Verse 2]
Ultimatum, domination
To succumb or suffer
You could touch her, break the structure
If only you were tougher
Bowin' down just to conform to
Rules you made to serve you
Demand sub-servants, live under your influence
Oh, that's what I won't do
[Chorus]
When you zig, I zag, when you zig, I zag
I zigzag
Whеn you zig, I zag, when you zig, I zag
I zigzag
When you zig, I zag, when you zig, I zag
I zigzag
Whеn you zig, I zag, when you zig, I zag
I zigzag
[Bridge]
When you zig, I zag
When you take, I grab
When you nod, I shake
While you're sleepin', I'm awake, I'm awake
I'm awake, I'm awake, I'm awake, I'm awake
I'm awake, I'm awake, I'm a—
[Chorus]
When you zig, I zag, when you zig, I zag
I zigzag
When you zig, I zag, when you zig, I zag
I zigzag
When you zig, I zag, when you zig, I zag
I zigzag
When you zig, I zag, when you zig, I zag
I zigzag
[Outro]
When you zig, I zag, when you zig, I zag
I zigzag
When you zig, I zag, when you zig, I zag
I zigzag
When you zig, I zag, when you zig, I zag
I zigzag
When you zig, I zag, when you zig, I zag
I zigzag

tracks.title: Linger
lyrics: [Verse 1]
On a night like tonight, we see stars in the sky
And they die, big black holes, something's shapeshiftin' deep in your mind
Deep in your mind
Like the tides to the moon, yeah, I'm risin' to you
In the church of your room, what is gone is gone forever this time
Is gone forever this time
[Pre-Chorus]
You can tell me that it's human nature
To be too interlaced with danger
Were you always a stranger?
Was ours always a strange love?
[Chorus]
At the night's edge, you know that I'll follow
Anywhere your blood flows red, I'll make you just like me
And you let it linger, linger, linger
At the night's edge, you know that I'll follow
Anywhere your blood flows red, I'll show you who to be
And you let it linger, linger, linger
Over me
[Verse 2]
In the whites of your eyes, I can see my next life
Smell the lilies at night, tell me what you will remember me by
I don't care if you lie
[Pre-Chorus]
You can tell me that it's human nature
To be too interlaced with danger
Were you always a stranger?
Was ours always a strange love?
[Chorus]
At the night's edge, you know that I'll follow
Anywhere your blood flows red, I'll make you just like me
And you let it linger, linger, linger
At the night's edge, you know that I'll follow
Anywhere your blood flows red, I'll make you just like me
And you let it linger, linger, linger
At the night's edge, you know that I'll follow
Anywhere your blood flows red, I'll show you who to be
And you let it linger, linger, linger
Over me

tracks.title: The Attic
lyrics: [Verse 1]
Can I put my bags down here?
How do I know you won't disappear?
Can I? Can I?
Would it be okay to take it slow?
Just tell me if you don't, you don't want me here
I was, I was
Always quick to rush in, always all or nothing
That's how it was, that's how it was
Shouldn't we just cut the cord?
If you could hurt me more than he ever did
This is no way to live
[Pre-Chorus]
Got my feet on the ground, but my head's up the stairs
(Don't jump in, I cannot swim)
And I'm spiralin' down, but I'm up in the, up in the air
(I can't take loss, can't lose again)
I'm up in the air
And it's fine in the basement and on the first floor
(If we jump in, I cannot swim)
Though my knees aren't shakin', my head's feelin' worse than before
(Can't lose again)
Is it worse than before?
[Chorus]
Don't think I can stand it, ah yeah
There's panic in the attic, panic in the attic
You're not the one who did me damage, not yet
But there's panic in the attic, panic in the attic
It's not your fault
[Verse 2]
Can I make the paradigm shift?
Or will you leave me like my father did
When I was a kid?
Can there be another way?
Is it too soon to say?
Can it be what it is?
Can you handle all this?
[Pre-Chorus]
Got my feet on the ground, but my head's up the stairs
(Don't jump in, I cannot swim)
And I'm spiralin' down, but I'm up in the, up in the air
(I can't take loss, can't lose again)
I'm up in the air
And it's fine in the basement and on the first floor
(If we jump in, I cannot swim)
Though my knees aren't shakin', my head's feelin' worse than before
(Can't lose again)
Is it worse than before?
[Chorus]
Don't think I can stand it, ah yeah
There's panic in the attic, panic in the attic
You're not the one who did me damage, not yet
But there's panic in the attic, panic in the attic
It's not your fault

tracks.title: Motorbike
lyrics: [Intro: Simon Wilcox]
I wonder why nothing catches my eye
Quite like the sight of a girl with a powerful machine between her legs
[Verse 1: Poppy & Simon Wilcox]
Makin' it squeal, makin' it beg
Lookin' so free, so in control
Want to love her, I want to know
What it's like to be between her (Legs)
London, Paris to Berlin
The power she earned, uncharted
Not selfish, self-servin'
Teach me how and I'll learn it (Legs)
[Pre-Chorus: Poppy]
So tell me, can I ride with you?
Baby, can I ride with you?
[Chorus: Poppy & Simon Wilcox]
That girl on a motorbike, goin' where she wants to
Girl on a motorbike, never check the rearview
Girl on a motorbike, no one can confine her
Epitome of freedom, I'm followin' behind her
Girl on a motorbike, goin' where she wants to
Girl on a motorbike, never check the rearview
Girl on a motorbike, no one can confine her
Epitome of freedom, I'm followin' behind her (Legs)
[Verse 2: Poppy & Simon Wilcox]
Makin' it squeal, makin' it beg
Lookin' so free, so in control
Want to love her, I want to know
What it's like to be between her (Legs)
[Pre-Chorus: Poppy]
So tell me, can I ride with you?
Baby, can I ride with you?
[Chorus: Poppy]
That girl on a motorbike, goin' where she wants to
Girl on a motorbike, never check the rearview
Girl on a motorbike, no one can confine her
Epitome of freedom, I'm followin' behind her
Girl on a motorbike, goin' where she wants to
Girl on a motorbike, never check the rearview
Girl on a motorbike, no one can confine her
Epitome of freedom, I'm followin' behind her
[Bridge: Poppy & Simon Wilcox]
(Legs)
(Legs)
(Legs)
(Legs)
(Baby goin' vroom, vroom)
(Legs) Girl on a motorbike, goin' where she wants to
Girl on a motorbike, never check the rearview
(Baby goin' vroom, vroom, vroom)

Epitome of freedom, I'm followin' behind her
(Baby goin' vroom, vroom)

Girl on a motorbike, never check the rearview
(Baby goin' vroom, vroom)
(Legs) Girl on a motorbike, no one can confine her
Epitome of freedom, I'm followin' behind her (Vroom, vroom)
[Chorus: Poppy]
Girl on a motorbike, goin' where she wants to
Girl on a motorbike, never check the rearview
Girl on a motorbike, no one can confine her

tracks.title: Prove It
lyrics: [Verse 1]
I am the blood and the guts smeared all over the page
I'm on the wall of a gallery, put on display
A culmination of mistakes in a picture frame
Put me up for sale for a price you cannot pay
[Pre-Chorus]
I'm impatient, I hate waitin', I get full from a taste
I never stop for your opinion or ask for your take
I am impatient, I hate waitin', I get full from a taste
I never stop for your opinion or ask for your take
[Chorus]
I got no one to prove myself to but me
That's why my heels are dug in so deep
[Verse 2]
I am the blood and the guts and I'm red with rage
You wouldn't recognize me or the ways I've changed
I've learned to do it different while you do it the same
(Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
Now I'm up for sale for a price you cannot pay
(Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
[Bridge]
I won't get in 'cause I re-recognize the cage
That's where I've been, yeah, it's all writ on my face
You think I'm mean, ah, but you don't know my rage
I won't get in 'cause I re-recognize the—
I won't get in 'cause I re-recognize the cage
That's where I've been, yeah, it's all writ on my face
You think I'm mean, ah, but you don't know my rage
I won't get in 'cause I re-recognize the cage
[Chorus]
I got no one to prove myself to but me
(Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
That's why my heels are dug in so deep
(Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
[Outro]
I am the blood and the guts smeared all over the page
I'm on the wall of a gallery, put on display
A culmination of mistakes in a picture frame
(Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
Put me up for sale for a price you cannot pay
(Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
